content:
Jai's school is located at $3^{\text{rd}}$ Avenue and $10^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by the point $(3,10)$ on the map below. His soccer practice takes place at $9^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $2^{\text{nd}}$ Street, represented by $(9, 2)$ on the map.  To get to soccer practice after school, he walks down $3^{\text{rd}}$ Avenue then over on $2^{\text{nd}}$ Street.

**Plot Jai's school and his soccer practice field on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How far does Jai walk to get to soccer practice after school?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
